messages.title: Working for You All Year Round - Not Just At Election Time
messages.content: Julian Knight and your local Conservative team work hard all year round, not just at election time.

messages.title: A Strong Local Voice
messages.content: Julian Knight is a strong local voice for Solihull.

messages.title: For a strong local voice of Princess Ward

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaign to protect our precious local green spaces.
Plan to create more local jobs and to help local businesses to thrive.
Working to provide the best education for our children.
Working hard to ensure we have the healthcare services we deserve.
Plan to keep our streets safe.

mentions.candidate: Julian Knight has built a strong reputation as a hard worker.

issues.education: Working to provide the best education for our children.
issues.environment: Campaign to protect our precious local green spaces.
issues.health: Working hard to ensure we have the healthcare services we deserve.

leaflet.personalStatement: Julian Knight is proud to live in Solihull with his wife.

quotes.text: Julian Knight has built a strong reputation as a hard worker.

images.caption: Julian Knight engaging with the community and working with local law enforcement.
Local team supporting Julian Knight in community activities.
Julian Knight volunteering and participating in local events.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Julian Knight is photographed in various community settings, indicating hands-on involvement in local issues.
